title: Cinemax's Outcast - NY Comic-Con 2015 Trailer
text: Cinemax's Outcast - NY Comic-Con 2015 Trailer Reported by Outsiders - 2015.10.11 After successfully adapting his zombie comic book into two hit cable shows for AMC, "The Walking Dead" creator Robert Kirkman is now teaming up with Cinemax for the small-screen version of his exorcism horror comic "Outcast." Kirkman recently visited New York Comic-Con this weekend to premiere this new trailer, which sees Patrick Fugit (of "Gone Girl" and "Almost Famous" fame) playing Kyle Barnes, a young West Virginia man who, since childhood, has developed a bizarre awareness of supernatural activities, and now teams up with an unorthodox evangelist reverend as they investigate strange cases concerning demonic possession. Outcast stars Patrick Fugit, Philip Glenister, Wrenn Schmidt, Gabriel Bateman, Julia Crockett, Reg E. Cathey, Kip Pardue
